overview:
CEO - NiiD Technologies

NiiD Technologies is a software firm that deals primarily in Mobile Applications (Android/iOS), Web Application development (CRM, MIS), and Web Design. It has a portfolio that includes Bharat Petroleum, a Fortune 500 company, and Publicis, one of the world’s lead advertising agencies. Its main development center is based out of Pune, India, and it has a strong New York and London presence.

Yan Vishnepolsky is the CEO and one of two business partners leading NiiD Technologies. He is responsible for Business Development and Business Operations. He brings with him 10 years of experience in management and technical certifications such Oracle Certified Professional and Sun Certified Java Professional.
